current.home-testimonials-title: What People Are Saying About Us
current.home-testimonials-text1:
This Floor Pillow Lounger cover is awesome! I bought a king size one for my 9 year old daughter to take on sleepovers. I got pillows at Target. It took no time to stuff them in. The zippers work great. The fabric is super soft. I roll it up and tie it with a ribbon so it's easy to carry!

Kate P
current.home-testimonials-text2:
We ordered this Floor Bed Cover for my daughter's sixth birthday.The package arrived on time. My daughter absolutely loved it. We put it inside her indoor play tent. We got 5 firm pillows to go inside it. She can sit up and read or play on her electronics or take a nap. The lounger is constructed well, should last a long time. Her older sister is jealous and wants one too :)

Sherry D
current.home-testimonials-text3:
Absolutely love! I have to admit bought the king size version for my 3 year old daughter. We were going on vacation with family and knew the room would be tight for space so bought this for her to sleep on in the room. It was way more comfortable and roomy than I ever imagined. Even though I bought it for my daughter my entire family has utilized it. My niece took it camping, and I have to admit even I felt asleep and napped on it (so this should tell you how roomy it is)- my older kids and niece are now asking for one for Christmas! Would definitely recommend.

Brenda W.
current.home-testimonials-text4:
Such a great idea. I love that the cover can be removed and thrown in the wash or pillows can be replaced when they go flat. We have received multiple compliments about these pillow mattresses. I had no trouble fitting the pillows in and getting the cover zipped. The kids use them when watching movies, reading books, taking naps. They also like to stand them on their side and put a blanket over it as a fort.

Lisa Z.
